column1: Little Goat Diner////For the most part
column2: the food is very sub-par.  The food seems very unbalanced and each dish is either too rich
column4: or is just not good.  I'm really disappointed that this place is associated with Girl & the Goat - which is out of this world- I feel like this is the red headed step child. If you can't afford Girl & the Goat
column5: or you just don't want to wait to get in
column6: DO NOT think this is anything like it... it's just not.
